scripts.build-prod: npm run build-dev && npm run build-ui && npm run build-css
scripts.clean: rm -rf output bower_components node_modules && cd css && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.watch-ui: pulp -w --then 'npm run build-dev-css' build -I ui-guide --to docs/example.js
scripts.build-css: cd css && npm run build-prod && cp ./dist/cn-tailwind.css ../docs/cn-tailwind.css
scripts.build-dev-css: cd css && npm run build-dev && cp ./dist/cn-tailwind.css ../docs/cn-tailwind.css
